name: Fourteen
description:
Fourteen is a action-platformer where the player starts the game trapped inside enemy facility, after successfully stealing the R.G.E.

Progress through the levels and challenges to escape from the facility and claim the R.G.E. for yourself.

Every time:

  • you die;

  • you kill something;

  • an enemy dies;

The enemy get’s it’s damage increased and it’s reload time decreased.

Your weapons are powered by R.G.E.. You have a shotgun, and a deflector shield. You use the shotgun to kill enemies if you wish, and the deflector shield can deflect enemy bullets.

You need to get the keys to advance through the levels.

Don’t let the chaos consume you before you escape the facility.

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 40.

Apart from the background music all assets were made by me.

Thank you for playing the game.
